column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I had the jinya no. 1 (I think)
column2: and it was delicious! The broth was incredible
column4: and was very filling. I kind of wished I didn't had anything to eat the earlier that afternoon because I couldn't finish my bowl
column5: but I wished I did. Would definitely recommend ordering your bowl a little spicier than you think you can handle
column6: because however spicy you think your bowl is
